name: Dad
greetingText: I wanted to give you something nice..
wishText: Thank you for always being awesome!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I love and miss you so so much!!
replayText: But I hope you like my gift :)
